verbose_text: Transfection of alpha2,6- and alpha2,3-sialyltransferase genes and GlcNAc transferase genes into U-373 MG human glioma cells affects glycoconjugate expression and enhances cell death.
evidence: alpha2,6- and alpha2,3-sialyltransferase genes and GlcNAc transferase genes into U-373 MG human glioma cells affects glycoconjugate expression and enhances cell death
